item.description:
Dear Worcester Photography Center,

I am contacting you regarding the UMass Medicine Cancer Walk. 

Our walk event this year is on Sunday, September 25th from 10:00 a.m. to around 12:30 p.m.  (Please note: We have moved to an earlier start time.)

As before we are looking for any photographers who may want to volunteer their time and talents to our event. 

Would you be willing to help us out with taking photographs the day of the event adn then providing us with images? Can I ask for photographers to join us that day and help out?

 

2011 Event Details

Date: September 25, 2011
Start Time: 10 am
Registration: 8 am

Registration Fee: $10; children 12 and under free
Location: 55 Lake Avenue, Worcester, MA 01655

 

Please contact me if you can volunteer your time.

Denise Mandeville

 

UMass Medicine Development Office

UMass Medicine Cancer Walk

333 South Street, 13E-495

Shrewsbury, MA  01545

 

Denise.Mandeville@umassmed.edu

 

Phone:  508-856-1318

    Fax:  508-856-5565

 

Join us for the UMass Medicine's Cancer Walk - Sunday, September 25th, 2011
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the Volenteer tent - Tell them you are from the Worcester Photo Center there to take photos...

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: UMass Cancer Walk Looking for Photographers to Capture the Days Events
